request.description: Login To Arena API Endpoint
This will copy the Arena session id to the headers for all endpoints in this collection so that you do not need to manually copy the Arena session id each time.
Logout from Arena and invalidate the Arena session id.

body.raw:
{
    "active": true,
    "allowNegatives": true,
    "decimalPlaces": 2,
    "defaultValue": 12.00,
    "description": "A number example.",
    "example": "12.00",
    "fieldType": "NUMBER",
    "globalAttribute": true,
    "maxValue": 1000.00,
    "name": "Number Example",
    "required": false,
    "visibleWhenBlank": true
}

Returns categories that have not been soft deleted.

Returns all categories that are currently assignable to files.

20 resources are returned by default.
A maximum of 400 resources can be returned.
Use query paramaters ?limit=400&offset=0 for first 400, ?limit=400&offset=400 for next 400, ?limit=400&offset=800, and so on.

Complex criteria can be used with ?criteria=[[value]].
The criteria value must be url encoded and be in the criteria format specified in the documentation.

request.description:
Bulk Mode can be used to improve performance when creating a great deal of content.
It works by indexing the created content when bulk mode is stopped instead of indexing the data after each successful create.

1) Start bulk mode: POST /bulkmode

2) Add query string ?bulkmode=true to each endpoint: POST /items?bulkmode=true

3) Stop bulk mode: PUT /bulkmode/guid {"active": false}
